content: PATIENT_ID CRI79825B shows completed step therapy requirements for congenital heart complications dated 04/12/2024 (EVENT_DATE), with 3 echocardiograms and 2 specialist consults documented. Claims processing indicates missing pre-cert for genetic testing panel CTN-11D (TREATMENT). Facility code A7L records Coastal Research Institute campus (LOCATION) as service location. Demographic sheet lists patient as 23-year-old male research participant (DEMOGRAPHIC) with student insurance extension.
